title: TEMBER alternates
content:
Hi, i'm looking for some help in choosing which versions to go with on a font i made named tember. the swf file shows the original version and some alternates. Thanks ahead of time for any help.
tember
temberalter.swf (4 k)
!-/attachment-!\>!-attachment:\>
author: eightone

comments.content:
I vote on #1. definately not number 3 - it dosen't look like that was your original purpose at all.   
   
the left rounded finishes vs. square finishes right is nice and would make some interesting white space in between characters.   
   
both rounded sides dosen't look as distinguised.   
   
nice font. its got that meld of retro and future all in one. neat
